fields.shortDescription: Learn how to expand your career as an ISSA Fitness Coach.
fields.longDescription: You have a passion for health and fitness, and now with a Fitness Coach Certification you'll be able to help more people, earn more money, and be the go-to expert when it comes to people's health and wellness needs!

fields.shortDescription: Receive your CPR/AED Certification online from the comforts of your home. You don't need to leave your living room to complete this certification today.
fields.longDescription: Once enrolled, you will complete an online self-paced, interactive, multi-media training course. The online course takes approximately 30 to 60 minutes to complete. After completing your online course, you can immediately download a printable course completion certificate. If you are renewing your CPR/AED certification for employment or insurance purposes, ask your employer or insurance carrier if online CPR/AED is an accepted method of renewal.

content.value: Thank you!
Congratulations on taking the first step toward turning your passion for fitness into a career!
Someone will be reaching out to you within 48 hours.

.

fields.headline: Achieve success with ease. Our 3-step plan guides you to success.

content.value: ISSA is the best move I've made in extending my career. ISSA made it so easy for me. The Success Coaches have ALL been patient, kind and helpful. I encourage anyone who is considering a career in health and fitness to pursue ISSA for their future education needs.

ISSA courses offer you the ability to be diverse. I have had the opportunity to work with youth, elderly, bodybuilders, and group sessions. I will continue my certifications with ISSA. The program works wonders and I am honored to be a part of their organization.
ISSA is by far a fantastic company. From the variety of CEU‚Äôs, to the support, they make recertification very easy.

fields.title: Ian Simon | ISSA Glute Specialist new

content.value: ISSA‚Äôs certifications and continued education prepared me to not only become an elite trainer, but a smart business person in the health and fitness industry. If you‚Äôre looking to begin your fitness career or expand it, I couldn‚Äôt think of a better organization that prepares you.

Kristen Burns | ISSA Strength and Conditioning Coach

fields.headlineText: Kristen Burns | ISSA Strength and Conditioning Coach

content.value: The Strength and Conditioning Program gave me the tools to take my training to the next level. I feel prepared and excited to help athletes reach their goals with the help of my training. I had a great experience with ISSA from initial inquiry to certification!

fields.title: Jessica Ledbetter | ISSA Fitness Coach new

content.value: I have had the opportunity to really help other people change their lives. I‚Äôve had clients come in with no hope for themselves and leave with a new vision.¬† I love what I do and I‚Äôm very grateful to ISSA for having the well written courses I needed to be able to become a successful fitness coach.

fields.identifier: Kenneth Hunter Jr. | ISSA Fitness Coach
Kenneth Hunter Jr. | ISSA Fitness Coach

fields.title: Kenneth Hunter Jr. | ISSA Fitness Coach new

fields.headlineText: Kenneth Hunter Jr. | ISSA Fitness Coach

content.value: I studied hard and now I can proudly say I am a certified Fitness Coach through ISSA, one of the best families I have been a part of. If anyone has a passion for fitness and helping others, ISSA IS THE TEAM TO JOIN.

fields.identifier: Michael Brooks | ISSA Certified Personal Trainer
Michael Brooks | ISSA Certified Personal Trainer

fields.title: Michael Brooks | ISSA Certified Personal Trainer new

fields.headlineText: Michael Brooks | ISSA Certified Personal Trainer

content.value: I've been coaching clients for over 35 years and worked with several other personal training certifying agencies. ISSA has been by FAR the best experience great customer service and up to date courses. I would recommend them to anyone looking to start a career or continue their education in the Health & Wellness industry.

ISSA is the perfect way to obtain your certification for your health and wellness business, especially if you are looking to connect with a community of supportive people. ISSA provides ongoing support and a positive environment for your growth and the success of your business.

fields.title: Fred Wilson | ISSA Fitness Coach new

content.value: ISSA has certified me since 2010 and I find their educational materials very useful in my private practice. I'm certified as a fitness trainer, specialist in senior fitness, and water fitness trainer. I would highly recommend ISSA to anyone with an interest in fitness training. I'm currently enrolled in ISSA's bodybuilding and online training specialty courses and I'm enjoying both immensely.

fields.identifier: Who can take an ISSA program?

content.value: Who can take an ISSA program?
Anyone 18 years of age or older can take a certification with us. You don‚Äôt need previous industry experience ‚Äî all you need before taking the exam is proof of a¬†
CPR/AED certification.

fields.identifier: How do I know if ISSA right for me?

content.value: How do I know if ISSA right for me?

Do you love fitness and exercise? Do you want to help others get more active and discover the joy of working out? Do you want a different (or better) career? Or do you just love learning brand new things? If your answer was ‚Äòyes‚Äô to any of these, then ISSA is probably right for you. Speak to one of our Fitness Education Advisors to find out for sure though.
Are the ISSA certifications accredited?

At the moment, ISSA offers five NCCA accredited exams through our subsidiary NCCPT ‚Äì Certified Personal Trainer, Certified Yoga Instructor, Certified Group Exercise Instructor, Certified Indoor Cycling Instructor and Certified Strength Training Specialist.

fields.identifier: Can I take the program even if I live internationally?

content.value: Can I take the program even if I live internationally?
Yes! There are ISSA Certified trainers in 174 countries around the globe. If you‚Äôre wondering about a specific country, give us a call ‚Äî we‚Äôll answer any questions.

fields.identifier: How long will it take me to complete the program?

content.value: How long will it take me to complete the program?

Honestly? It depends on you and on the program you‚Äôre taking. When you start, you have six months to finish. You can join the ‚Äòfast track‚Äô program and complete the Certified Personal Trainer program in four weeks. Or you can complete it in 12 weeks with our self guided study track. Or take it at your own pace.

fields.identifier: I don‚Äôt do well with exams ‚Äî will this still work for me?

content.value: I don‚Äôt do well with exams ‚Äî will this still work for me?

Yes. Our team is here to support you with everything you need to pass the exam ‚Äî they can review practice essays, answer questions and point you in the right direction. By the time you‚Äôre sitting in front of the 200 multiple choice questions for the CPT exam, you‚Äôll be more than ready.

fields.identifier: Where can I work with this certificate?

content.value: Where can I work with this certificate?
As an ISSA Certified trainer, you can work in gyms, independently, or online. The ISSA Certification is accepted at most franchise gyms in the United States.

fields.identifier: When do I get my physical certificate?

content.value: When do I get my physical certificate?
Your certificate will be mailed to you within 7-10 business days after passing your certification exam. ISSA does not mail certifications outside of the United States.

fields.identifier: I want to use one of the split-month payment options ‚Äî do I have to go through a credit check?

content.value: I want to use one of the split-month payment options ‚Äî do I have to go through a credit check?
No. Everyone is 100% approved with no credit check.

fields.title: ISSA | Frequently Asked Questions
fields.seoDescription: Check our frequently asked questions on course content and completion, student services, continuing education and more.

content.value: Purchase of ISSA training materials is not an eligibility requirement to take the accredited exam nor does it imply a passing score.

fields.headline: Our Student Success team will help you every step of the way

fields.identifier: The Fitness Education Advisers will help you find the right certification

content.value: The Fitness Education Advisers will help you find the right certification

Available whenever needed, ISSA Fitness Education Advisers are dedicated to every student‚Äôs individual growth and success. They are here to help you find the best certification to achieve your goal and be as successful as you want to be.
This department specializes in helping you with:
Understanding and navigating the process of becoming a trainer
Finding the right certificate option to fit your goals
They will be a friendly point of contact when you need help

fields.identifier: The Student Engagement Team will help you finish your cert and land a job

content.value: The Student Engagement Team will help you finish your cert and land a job
Student Engagement is focused on putting students first, and providing appropriate accommodations to create a smooth journey while in the hands of ISSA.
This department specializes in helping customers with:
Finding the resources and tips so you can master the material
Staying motivated throughout your entire certification journey
Navigating the job interview, career and side hustle options

fields.identifier: The Student Services Team will help you with all your admin needs

content.value: The Student Services Team will help you with all your admin needs
Student Services Team is here to help with course extensions, making sure you receive your hard earned certifications, and also keeping those certifications up to date.
This department specializes in helping customers with:
Course extensions
Ensuring receipt of certifications
Certification renewals

fields.identifier: The Education Support Team will help you thrive while you study

content.value: The Education Support Team will help you thrive while you study

Recognized as a world leader in fitness education, ISSA is dedicated to ensuring students receive the tools and resources they need to thrive. With ISSA‚Äôs Education Support Team, enrolled ISSA students will receive expert assistance from our experienced team of advisers.
This department specializes in helping customers with:
Exam questions and preparation
Understanding how to navigate the dashboard
Finding the right answers when stuck

fields.identifier: The Student Financial Services will help you find practical finance solutions

content.value: The Student Financial Services will help you find practical finance solutions
Here to help with all your billing needs, ISSA‚Äôs Student Financial Services team is committed to providing students with practical financial solutions.
This department specializes in helping customers with:
Payment card processing
Completing your payment obligations
Finding individualized financial solutions to meet your needs

fields.title: ISSA | CPT Live Learning Experience
fields.seoDescription: The ISSA Live Learning Experience is a complete online personal training course with LIVE learning options, so you have all the support you need!

content.value: Master new specializations so you can serve your clients better and earn more.

fields.title: ISSA | Glute Specialist
fields.seoDescription: Whether it's for function, form, or figure - better glutes are the new #1 for clients. Make your clients' ideal glutes a reality with the first and only certification of its kind.

fields.title: ISSA | Tactical Conditioning Specialist
fields.seoDescription: Learn how to create customized training programs that fit the extreme physical needs of tactical athletes.

fields.title: ISSA | DNA-Based Fitness Coach
fields.seoDescription: Master how and why clients respond to fitness programs through DNA testing and create their unique ideal programming.

fields.title: ISSA | Group Exercise Instructor
fields.seoDescription: Create a community and a following in fitness beyond one person at a time.¬†Optimize your time and earn more through small and large group classes. Build your signature programs, motivating more people to achieve happier and healthier lives.

fields.title: ISSA | Lifespan Coach
fields.seoDescription: Learn how to help generations of all ages, from youth to seniors get active, and stay healthy.

fields.identifier: ISSA | Homepage Strength and Conditioning Coach Link

fields.title: ISSA | Strength and Conditioning Coach
fields.seoDescription: Help every level of athlete achieve their optimal performance through specific training programs. Get everything you need to improve your client‚Äôs strength, agility, and conditioning to perform their best!

fields.identifier: ISSA | Homepage Corrective Exercise Specialist Link

fields.title: ISSA | Corrective Exercise Specialist
fields.seoDescription: Help clients achieve a better range of motion, fix muscle imbalances, optimize performance, prevent pain and injuries. Meet the demand for relief from low back, shoulder and knee pain.

fields.title: ISSA | Powerlifting Instructor
fields.seoDescription: Prepare your training clients to incorporate powerlifting techniques into their strength training program. Visit ISSAonline.com to learn more.

fields.identifier: ISSA | Homepage Indoor Cycling Instructor Link

fields.title: ISSA | Indoor Cycling Instructor
fields.seoDescription: ISSA's Indoor Cycling Instructor certification fully prepares you to lead successful classes of any size in any environment!

fields.title: ISSA | Yoga Fundamentals
fields.seoDescription: Learn the benefits of yoga, techniques and tools for teaching, and fundamental information for jump-starting your career.

fields.identifier: ISSA | Homepage Exercise Recovery Specialist Link

fields.title: ISSA | Exercise Recovery Specialist
fields.seoDescription: Unlock the science behind recovery techniques to help athletes and all your clients feel better and get results faster. Show clients how recovery, sleep and stress are connected so you can build long term customer loyalty and maximize your revenue.

fields.title: ISSA | Certified Health Coach
fields.seoDescription: As a Health Coach, you‚Äôll help clients overcome physical and mental barriers preventing healthier living. Get the tools and motivation so your clients will implement the lifestyle changes to improve their physical health.

fields.title: ISSA | Online Coach
fields.seoDescription: Start, manage and grow a successful online coaching business. Learn how to attract clients and gain new revenue streams from anywhere in the world.

fields.title: ISSA | Transformation Specialist
fields.seoDescription: Master the techniques to effectively coach and influence behavioral patterns for improved¬†physical, mental and emotional well-being. Help your clients achieve long lasting lifestyle changes.

fields.title: ISSA | Bodybuilding Specialist
fields.seoDescription: Become the ‚Äúgo to‚Äù coach to build muscle mass, definition, and symmetry while burning more fat. Master the programs for specific weight training, nutrition and supplementation techniques for male or female bodybuilders.

fields.title: ISSA | Exercise Therapist
fields.seoDescription: Learn the techniques and exercises to rehabilitate your clients from training injuries or accidents. Address both chronic conditions and isolated issues to get your clients moving and feeling better.

fields.title: Yes. You can change your life with ISSA.

content.value: This isn‚Äôt just a certification ‚Äî it‚Äôs a path to victory.
¬†A way to try something new. To break out of your rut. To try a new career and to help people. It‚Äôs a way to improve lives through fitness, nutrition and mental toughness.

That‚Äôs why world-record holding athletes joined forces with PhDs and the best customer support around. It‚Äôs why we have 8000+ Gym Partners, 10,000+ Trustpilot reviews and a 98% U.S. job placement rate.¬†
And it‚Äôs why nearly a half million trainers and fitness lovers from 174 countries chose ISSA.
This is not a one-and-done kind of certification. Once you take a program with us, we‚Äôll support and help until you achieve your goals.
1.¬†Choose the right program for you.

¬†Not sure where to start? Talk to one of our Fitness Education
Advisors ‚Äî they‚Äôve helped nearly a half million students decide which program will lead them to success.
2.¬†Complete your program.

¬†Everything you need is there ‚Äî bootcamps, videos, supporting materials,
fast-track and self-paced options, a Success Coach to help you prepare, and more.
3.¬†Apply what you learned.

¬†Get your dream job coaching at a gym, launch your own PT side hustle or
design a workout plan for a friend. Whatever path you choose, our team is here to help ‚Äî from resume
reviews to career advice, we‚Äôve got you.

fields.headline: Success is just 3 steps away. And we'll help you take them.

content.value: Take that first, bold step towards your goals ‚Äî figure out if ISSA is right for you.
Our evaluation kit will help you:
See if you have the five qualities every successful trainer needs
Discover which program is right for you through the personalized quiz
Take a look at the exact career paths you‚Äôll be able to take
By the end, you‚Äôll know if ISSA‚Äôs right for you. And you‚Äôll have everything you need to enroll on hand.
